1_1.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Took a pink candy floss
1_1.speaker: Melanie

1_10.dialogue:
[wait time =4 speed=500] ~ 
Asked with a surprised look, "WHY?"
1_10.speaker: Melanie

1_11.dialogue:
[wait time =4 speed=500]
Because I am a killer.
1_11.speaker: John

1_12.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Screamed with a scared look.
1_12.speaker: Melanie

1_13.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] Because I have to kill you with this blade.
1_13.speaker: John

1_15.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~  Saw the blade knife and screamed.
1_15.speaker: Melanie

1_16.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Screamed with a scared look.
1_16.speaker: Melanie

1_17.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Knelt down and handed a pink candy floss
1_17.speaker: John

1_2.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] I thought you like pinky colour.
1_2.speaker: John

1_3.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] How do you know? Pink is my Favourite!
1_3.speaker: Melanie

1_4.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Smiled and nodded, " Umm, hmm."
1_4.speaker: Melanie

1_6.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] ~ Ate a candy floss happily
1_6.speaker: Melanie

1_7.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500] You should run now.
1_7.speaker: John

1_8.dialogue: [wait time =4 speed=500]  ~ Saw the blade knife and screamed.
1_8.speaker: Melanie
